info.label: Senior Principal Software Engineer
info.summary: Strategic technical leader with 20+ years of experience architecting and operating high-volume, mission-critical infrastructure. Proven track record of leading teams to deliver sub-second performance in high-stakes healthcare networks handling billions of transactions annually with high availability.

highlights: Direct a team of engineers in designing distributed systems that process millions of transactions daily with high availability and strict sub-second SLAs.
Champion performance tuning and capacity planning initiatives, successfully scaling core messaging engines to handle traffic spikes while maintaining system integrity.
Establish technical roadmaps and engineering standards, mentoring developers across the organization in building resilient, fault-tolerant distributed systems.

history.summary: Engineered robust systems for translating complex EDI messages, ensuring data integrity across healthcare exchanges.
Developed full-stack in-house web applications to enhance support staff efficiency.
highlights: Designed and implemented web services to seamlessly integrate legacy Smalltalk and Perl environments.
Administered and maintained a cluster of Linux servers, ensuring uptime and performance.
